response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Given its unique features and market position, I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable return on my investment. I look forward to your consideration of this offer. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 950000}
